resources.string: <font color="#CC0000">U</font> <font color="#FFCC00">n</font> <font color="#FFDE00">i</font> <font color="#097054">c</font> <font color="#000080">o</font> <font color="#8C489F">r</font> <font color="#443266">n</font>
Lily is generous of spirit and always thinks the best of others. She is as sweet as candy, and she casts spells of plenty and bounty
Windflower is silly and lovable. She is as sweet as a sugar lump, and she brings great fortune and riches
Rose is wistful and creative. She is pink like the sunset, and she brings great fortune and riches
Violet loves to look after the other unicorns. She is bonny and bright as the breeze, and she brings the sunshine and chases away clouds
Nightshade is often very naughty and is always being told off. She is a darling horse, spotty like a Dalmatian, and she dances away the thunderstorms
Ivy is loving and thoughtful. She is as white as the driven snow, and she casts magical spells
Marigold is as sweet as a Shetland pony. She is silver like the moonlight, and she changes the weather
Poppy is quick-witted and bright as a spark. She is as lovely as the day is long, and she makes wishes into horses
